updateSingle:
UPDATE OWNER_GROUP SET
            name=@name
            WHERE owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
getSingle:
SELECT T.rowid,T.* FROM OWNER_GROUP T
            WHERE T.owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
getLast: SELECT T.rowid,T.* FROM OWNER_GROUP T HAVING T.rowid=MAX(T.rowid)
getByRowid: SELECT T.rowid,T.* FROM OWNER_GROUP T WHERE T.rowid=@rowid
countAll: SELECT MAX(rowid) as last_id,COUNT(*) as records FROM OWNER_GROUP
